turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, Carson. Can you order a drink for me from Peets? I'm running on fumes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Which store do you want to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whatever is along my trip. I have to run an errand or two and I want to pick something up on the way back.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me go to their website and check. Give me a few seconds.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I heading to Georgetown. Is there anything in the area?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can check. Okay. There's one on M street. Is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That'll work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What do you have a taste for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I have a taste for a Mocha. But, I might want an Americano instead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Why not order both? That's a joke.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know what? That's not a bad idea? You sure you don't want anything yourself?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No. I'm trying to cut back.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Put in an order for a Mocha and Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Give me two smalls.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Give me regular in both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What time do you want for pickup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about one o'clock sharp.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Done. You're total is $6.55. That's including tax. The receipt should hit your SMS shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just display it to the server when get there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay thanks again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
